Adds color to print media examples.

data.name: Build your youtube theme
data.description:
Go to Mouse Hover off timer in customise settings to turn off hover effects if performance is an issue!
Feel free to criticize, highlight bugs , make suggestions, requests etc.
Tested in Chrome, functional in Firefox (more fixes to come please let me know if anything is broken!) ...
Thanks to my boys [A]live and Bodhi for bug testing

data.name: No gray-ify
hao123简洁萌化
data.description:
根据Ryan Galbraith的样式 (hao123 精简美化)和神代綺凜的样式(Bilibili 哔哩哔哩 Nekopara)所编辑
隐藏了所有广告(18年12月之后若有新广告请自己隐藏,或者点击更新),同时保留了顶栏
若有需要更改背景图片,请直接点击编辑,里面有注释告诉你听哪个是改背景图片的
该样式支持hao123新版/旧版(已测试通用)
---重要---
若点击下载无效,请先点击下面的"show CSS Code"按钮,等加载完内容再点击下载即可

若有疑问请联系QQ:949244916
